title: Help with a font ID
content:
Hello,  
Can anyone ID this font for me? I have looked everywhere and cannot find it. Thanks for the help.........

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040404im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lagomarsino%20font_5377.jpg)

 [‹ Chateauneuf-du-Pape 'Pure'](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040404/http:/typophile.com/node/48793 "Go to previous forum topic") [Monospaced Serif ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040404/http:/typophile.com/node/48770 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Inkwerks

comments.content:
That looks hand painted to me, and not very well done either although it has a charm of its own for that.

[Mikey Likes It Corpulent](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040404/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/mikey-likes-it-corpulent-nf/) is a Nick’s Fonts digitization of the late, great Mike Stevens’ casual script.
